scenario.name: Sipwise NGCP Benchmark UAC Caller
scenario.send: SUBSCRIBE sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=1]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=1] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=1]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=1]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=1]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=1]> Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="callee.csv" line=1]%///[call_id] CSeq: 30 SUBSCRIBE Contact: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=1]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Allow: INVITE,ACK,CANCEL,BYE,PRACK,INFO,UPDATE,OPTIONS,MESSAGE,NOTIFY,REFER Call-Info: <sip:[field2 file="caller.csv" line=1]>;appearance-index=1 Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 20 Event: line-seize Content-Length: [len]

ACK sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=1]@[field3 file="caller.csv" line=1] SIP/2.0 [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Content-Length: 0

SUBSCRIBE sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=1]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=1] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=1]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=1]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=1]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=1]> [field1 file="caller.csv" line=1] Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="callee.csv" line=1]%///[call_id] CSeq: 31 SUBSCRIBE Contact: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=1]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Allow: INVITE,ACK,CANCEL,BYE,PRACK,INFO,UPDATE,OPTIONS,MESSAGE,NOTIFY,REFER Call-Info: <sip:[field2 file="caller.csv" line=1]>;appearance-index=1 Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 20 Event: line-seize Content-Length: [len]
